text: Our system is building your personalized diet plan taking into account all the preferences you have selected.
While we prepare your comprehensive nutrition plan, you can see your menu for today. But previously, some useful information.
You can check, for each dish, its nutritional characteristics, ingredients, the recipe to cook it, and a presentation suggestion.
Also, if you don't feel like any of the suggested dishes, you can use the upper right button and we will offer you equivalent alternatives from a nutritional point of view.
